privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal information. Learn how we collect, use, and safeguard your data.

introduction.title: Our Commitment to Privacy
introduction.content: At سيرتي (Siraty), we believe that privacy is a fundamental right. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our CV building platform. We are committed to transparency and giving you control over your personal data.

dataCollection.title: Information We Collect
dataCollection.content:
We collect information you provide directly to us when using our platform:

• Personal information (name, email, phone number, location)
• Professional information (work experience, education, skills)
• CV content and formatting preferences
• Usage analytics and performance metrics

We do not collect sensitive personal information beyond what is necessary for CV creation. All data collection is voluntary and transparent.

dataUsage.title: How We Use Your Information
dataUsage.content:
We use the collected information to:

• Generate and format your CV documents
• Provide AI-powered suggestions and improvements
• Analyze ATS compatibility and optimization
• Improve our platform and user experience
• Provide customer support when needed

We never use your personal information for advertising or sell it to third parties.

dataStorage.title: Data Storage and Security
dataStorage.content:
Your data security is our priority:

• All data is stored securely using industry-standard encryption
• CV data is primarily stored locally in your browser
• Server-side storage is minimal and temporary
• We implement regular security audits and updates
• Access to personal data is strictly controlled

We retain data only as long as necessary to provide our services.

dataSharing.title: Information Sharing
dataSharing.content:
We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to third parties, except:

• With your explicit consent
• To comply with legal obligations
• To protect our rights and safety
• With service providers under strict confidentiality agreements

As an open-source project, our code is public, but your personal data remains private.

userRights.title: Your Rights and Choices
userRights.content:
You have the right to:

• Access your personal data
• Correct inaccurate information
• Delete your data (right to be forgotten)
• Export your data in a portable format
• Opt-out of data collection
• Request information about data processing

To exercise these rights, please contact us using the information below.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us:

terms.subtitle: Please read these terms carefully before using our platform. By using سيرتي, you agree to comply with and be bound by these terms.

introduction.title: Agreement to Terms
introduction.content: By accessing and using سيرتي ("the Service"), you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement. These Terms of Service govern your use of our CV building platform and all related services.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content:
By using our service, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to these terms. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our platform.

We may modify these terms at any time. Continued use of the service after changes constitutes acceptance of the modified terms.

useLicense.title: Use License
useLicense.content:
Permission is granted to temporarily use سيرتي for personal and commercial CV creation purposes. This license shall automatically terminate if you violate any of these restrictions.

You may not:
• Modify or copy the platform materials

prohibitedUses.title: Prohibited Uses
prohibitedUses.content:
You may not use our service:

• For any unlawful purpose or activity
• To transmit malicious code or harmful content
• To violate any international, federal, provincial, or state regulations or laws

serviceAvailability.title: Service Availability
serviceAvailability.content:
We strive to maintain continuous service availability but cannot guarantee uninterrupted access. The service is provided "as is" without warranties of any kind.

We reserve the right to:

• Restrict access for maintenance

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
disclaimer.content:

We are not responsible for:

learnMore.subtitle: Discover how our AI-powered platform is revolutionizing the way people create and optimize their resumes for career success.

introduction.title: Revolutionizing CV Creation
introduction.content: سيرتي is more than just a CV builder – it's your intelligent career companion. Built by developers for everyone, our platform combines cutting-edge AI technology with user-friendly design to help you create compelling resumes that get noticed by both humans and ATS systems. Whether you're a recent graduate or an experienced professional, سيرتي adapts to your needs and helps you present your best professional self.
